description: This source file defines a Java interface for accessing invoice item data within a Spring Data JPA repository context. It extends JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and includes a custom method for finding invoice items by invoice.

classes.name: InvoiceItemRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for InvoiceItem entities, providing standard CRUD and custom query method.

methods.name: findByInvoice
methods.description: Retrieves a list of InvoiceItem objects associated with a given Invoice object.
